instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-3330: What is 820-3330? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3330</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> short on 3v42
threads.message:
Board looks like it's never seen a dop of water in its life.
no greenlight
pp3v42 measures 2.1v and measures 11ohms to gnd on the system side, are there any known failure points on this board or is it a case of inject 3v and see what gets warm

<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3330</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> short on 3v42
threads.message: smc getting warm :( is there anywhere that sells smcs? or just have to order the donor boards?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3330</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> short on 3v42
threads.message: Get it from donors... I have a 3330 with a SMC coming in that i bought from eBay

threads.message: Donor boards on Ebay or Ali are the only source.
